overview: Back home one evening, Nathalie finds a man in her bathtub, a stranger who claims to be a pygmy. He is there, alone, and just wants to talk... Gradually Nathalie forgets her fear, seduced by the strange and lyrical vocabulary of this intruder, this deceptively naive poet. Despite the arrival of her companion, Nathalie begins to dream of a trip to distant shores
title: A Pygmy in the Bathtub
